subject: Attention:
body:
Attention:   
Did you receive the email that I sent to you as regards to your funds of $10.5M that you authorized a proxy to claim on your behalf?
Kindly revert to me with an answer to the above.
Mr. Paul Abbate
Director Fund Recovery Team

subject: Re:   Attention:
body:
Hello Mr. Paul Abbate, thank you for reaching out. I don't recall receiving an email about authorizing a proxy to claim funds on my behalf. Can you please provide more details about this?

Best wishes,
Jean

subject: Re: Attention:
body:
Attn: Jean

This is to acknowledge the receipt of your message.

For security purposes, I can not send details of the project as demanded by
you in your response unless you send me a copy of the first message
youreceived from  me and your details which must include your full name,
address and phone number. I need to confirm that I am corresponding with
the right person before opening up.

Thank you for your cooperation.

Mr. Paul Abbate
Director Fund Recovery Team

subject: Re: Attention:
body:
Hello Mr. Paul Abbate, thank you for your message. I understand the need for security measures. Could you please provide more information about the project before I share my details? I would like to know more about how we can proceed.

Best wishes,
Jean

subject: Re: Attention:
body:
Attn: Jean

Your message is received.

Kindly forward to me, the first message you received from me before I will
provide more information about the project and direct you on how we can
proceed.

Thank you for your cooperation.

Mr. Paul Abbate
Director Fund Recovery Team

subject: Re: Attention:
body:
Hello Mr. Paul Abbate, thank you for reaching out. I would be interested in learning more about the project and how we can proceed. Please go ahead and provide me with the details.

Best wishes,
Jean

subject: Re: Attention:
body:
Attn: Jean

Your message is received.

Well, I can only comply with you when you have met with my demands,

Thank you

Mr. Paul Abbate
Director Fund Recovery Team

subject: Re: Attention:
body:
Hello Mr. Paul Abbate, thank you for reaching out. I understand the importance of meeting demands in certain situations. Could you please provide more details about the fund recovery process? I'm interested to learn more about how it works.

Best wishes,
Jean

subject: Re: Attention:
body:
Hello Mr. Paul Abbate, thank you for reaching out. I'm interested in learning more about how your Fund Recovery Team operates. Can you provide me with some details on the process?

Best wishes,
Jean

subject: Re: Attention:
body:
Attn: Jean

Your message is received.

Your messages were received. It is obvious that you do not want to comply
with what is demanded of you. I have to stop all communication until you
are ready to comply with my directives.

Thank you and enjoy your weekend.

Mr. Paul Abbate
Director Fund Recovery Team

subject: Re: Attention:
body:
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I'm interested in learning more about the fund recovery process. Can you provide me with some details on how it works?

Best wishes,
Jean

subject: Re: Attention:
body:
Hello! Thank you for your message. I understand that you are looking for compliance with certain demands. Can you please provide more details on what is required to move forward?

Best wishes,
Jean
